chat.hello: I've been making some Poké Balls. Would you like to buy one?
It's good to be myself again! Did you need something?
chat.goodbye: I still can't thank you enough!

chat.hello: I really owe you a lot! That's why my prices are so low.
chat.goodbye: Thank you for shopping at my little store.

chat.hello: I want to start a real Poké Mart one day.
The apocalypse is so lonely. Thank you for visiting!
chat.goodbye: Come see us again, won't you?

chat.hello: Looking for anything special? I'm a little limited in my ingredients...
